description: List truckers with filtering and pagination
permissions: Admins can list all truckers. Non-admin users are limited to truckers tied to their memberships, including truckers where they have trucker memberships, broker memberships, truckers accepting tenders on their customers’ jobs, trucker referrals, customer-managed truckers, or broker-controlled customers.
validation_notes: --broker, --managing-customer, --trailer-classifications, and --within-customer-truckers-of accept comma-separated IDs. --broker-rating uses broker_id;rating1|rating2 format (e.g., 123;1|2|3). --company-address-within expects lat,lng:miles with miles as an integer. --favorite and --with-uninvoiced-approved-time-card expect literal true or false. --last-shift-start-at-min and --last-shift-start-at-max expect ISO 8601 datetimes. Filtering by --broker-vendor-id is rejected for non-admins without broker memberships.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --broker-rating
flags.description: Filter by broker rating (format: broker_id;rating1|rating2, e.g., 123;1|2|3)

flags.name: --last-shift-start-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum last shift start datetime (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --last-shift-start-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum last shift start datetime (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --managing-customer
flags.description: Filter by managing customer ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --with-uninvoiced-approved-time-card
flags.description: Filter by having uninvoiced approved time card (true/false)

flags.name: --within-customer-truckers-of
flags.description: Filter by customer truckers (customer ID, comma-separated for multiple)
